DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to validate current algorithms and evaluate safety and efficacy of overnight closed loop insulin delivery (FlorenceD2 system) in children with type 1 diabetes between 6 - 12 years of age in Luxembourg .
DOC.brief_title: Safety and Efficacy of Overnight Closed Loop in Children With Type 1Diabetes Mellitus in Luxembourg
